ARABIC: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'There is not one of us who does not have a known station.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is not one of us who does not have his appointed place," (declare the angels.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for us, there is none but has an appointed station.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The angels say, "Each of us has an appointed place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the angels say, “Each one of us has an appointed known position.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And there is not one of us (angels) but has his known place;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And there is none of us but has an assigned place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: None of us is there, but has a known station;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There is not one of us but hath his known position.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [The angels say], "Every single one of us has his place assigned:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Of us there is none but hath a station assigned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘There is none among us but has a known place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Those ranged in ranks say): "Not one of us but has a place appointed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: There is not one of us (angels) but has his known place (or position);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Gabriel said to the Prophet): 'Each of us has a known place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “There is not one of us but has an assigned position.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:164] Gabriel said to the Prophet (s): And there is not one of us, [us] the company of angels, but has a known station, in the heavens, in which he worships God and which he does not transgress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There is not one of us) said Gabriel (pbuh) (but hath his known position) a known position in heaven.
